## getVertexBufferAttribType() function

Get primitive type of a vertex attribute by specified vertex attribute index

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getVertexBufferAttribType(vertexBufferType: PBStructTypeInfo, attrib: number): PBPrimitiveTypeInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vertexBufferType | [PBStructTypeInfo](doc/markdown/./device.pbstructtypeinfo.md) | The structure type of the vertex buffer |
|  attrib | number |  |

**Returns:**

[PBPrimitiveTypeInfo](doc/markdown/./device.pbprimitivetypeinfo.md)

- The primitive type of the vertex attribute
